title: Graphic card Update Driver Crash
body:
275/5000
To start, I was on my computer to do a ranked solo q game, everything was normal in the select champ, suddenly, when I was about to be in the login screen, a message appeared saying who had an error or I had to update my video card drivers, so now i have a leave buster for nothing D:

replies.body: Was this a bugsplat error?  That can happen when a driver, bad game file, or something else is failing to render the game.  Run custom games for now, and go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix this up!
